content: **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the pictures of your croockshanks do not forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most heart **materials used** * círculo s amigurumi yarns in colors 6614 alfazema 2194 turquoise 5800 pistachio 1289 canary 4456 orange 3583 cherry and 8001 white * 2 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle * stitch markers * chains and ring for keychain rainbow is approximately 4 5 cm **note ** if you prefer to use another yarn do not forget to adapt the hook to a size that is more suitable **happy crocheting **
